title: Drawing, "Mechanically-Operated Cylinder-Top Secretary Desk", ca. 1805
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and wash and watercolor on paper
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: A cylinder-top secretary bookcase, with marquetry decoration; elevation and combined side elevation and section, showing mechanical arrangement of desk top.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Mechanically-Operated Cylinder-Top Secretary Desk", ca. 1805.
ca. 1805. Pen and black ink, brush and wash and watercolor on paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1911-28-470.
